episodes.title: Elan School: Teenage Wasteland. Elan/Dslide Part 2 SC S04 E03
episodes.description:
This is the second part in a trilogy centred around recovery as a business.  I realize that I only touched the very tip of the iceberg, and a very general one at that.  I urge you to explore Elan School and other institutions on your own if you are interested in learning more, although I warn you it is a disturbing rabbit hole to fall down.  

Join my patreon, become a producer!
www.patreon.com/LPRPresents

truly only a handful of sources below:

https://elan.school/learn-more/
https://www.amazon.com/DUCK-RAINCOAT-MAURA-CURLEY-ebook/dp/B00ANZ26QS
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6508926/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mIV6hhoj3-0
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tTCSfx47R1w
https://www.cultnews101.com/2016/03/the-day-smiley-helped-boy-escape-from.html
https://www.reddit.com/r/AMA/comments/2xofqe/i_am_a_survivor_of_the_élan_school_an_abusive/?rdt=43580
https://www.reddit.com/r/IAmA/comments/ga3gk/thank_you_reddit_you_helped_shut_down_the_elan/
http://elanabuse.nfshost.com

Thank you for watching!

See you in Part 3, and the conclusion
